trans-unit.source: A catalog that combines the elements of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um catálogo que combina os elementos de objetos <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" />.

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo implementa o <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: Quando você terminar de usar o tipo, descarte-direta ou indiretamente.

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: Para descartar o tipo diretamente, chame seu <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> método em um `try` / `catch` bloco.

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Para descartar indiretamente dele, use uma construção de linguagem, como `using` (em c#) ou `Using` (no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a seção "Usando um objeto que implementa IDisposable" o <xref:System.IDisposable> tópico de interface.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> objects to add to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> or <see langword="null" /> to create an empty <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> para adicionar ao <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> ou <see langword="null" /> para criar um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> vazio.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> class with the specified catalogs.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> com os catálogos especificados.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="catalogs" /> contains an element that is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="catalogs" /> contém um elemento que é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A array of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> objects to add to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> a serem adicionados a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> class with the specified catalogs.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> com os catálogos especificados.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="catalogs" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="catalogs" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="catalogs" /> contains an element that is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="catalogs" /> contém um elemento que é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying catalogs of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os catálogos subjacentes do objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> objects that underlie the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> objetos subjacentes a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> object have changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o conteúdo do objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> tiver sido alterado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> object are changing.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o conteúdo do objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> estiver sendo alterado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the catalog.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um enumerador que itera por meio do catálogo.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the catalog.
trans-unit.target: Um enumerador que pode ser usado para iterar por meio do catálogo.

trans-unit.source: The conditions of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> objects to be returned.
trans-unit.target: As condições dos objetos <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> a serem retornados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the export definitions that match the constraint expressed by the specified definition.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as definições de exportação que correspondem à restrição expressa pela definição especificada.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Tuple`2" /> containing the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> objects and their associated <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" /> objects for objects that match the constraint specified by <paramref name="definition" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <see cref="T:System.Tuple`2" /> que contém os objetos <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> e seus objetos <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" /> associados para objetos que correspondem à restrição especificada por <paramref name="definition" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="definition" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="definition" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartCatalogChangeEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartCatalogChangeEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog.Changed" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog.Changed" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartCatalogChangeEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartCatalogChangeEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog.Changing" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog.Changing" />.
